title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of participants in millions, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of participants in millions has decreased over the Year.

Number of participants in millions is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2015, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Max Number of participants in millions about 5.48 was recorded at Year 2007
Min Number of participants in millions about 3.39 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of participants in millions, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2013.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
